OPCHAIN.Name: All OPCHAINs
OPCHAIN.Description: This is the base OPCHAIN that encompasses all known OPCHAINs to date of the publication of current version.

OPCHAIN.Name: Deploying infrastructure
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) deploy teleinformatic infrastructure, that they intend to use in order to carry out operations

OPCHAIN.Name: Deploying domain node
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) deploy part of an teleinformatic infrastructure accessible with a domain name, that they intend to use in order to carry out operations

OPCHAIN.Name: Deploying IP node
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) deploy part of an teleinformatic infrastructure accessible with an IP address, that they intend to use in order to carry out operations

OPCHAIN.Name: Deploying exploit pack
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) deploy an exploit pack, that they intend to use in order to carry out operations

OPCHAIN.Name: Weaponizing documents
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) weaponize a document or a file of a certain format, that they intend to use in order to carry out operations

OPCHAIN.Name: Gaining foothold
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) gain access to the first node in the targeted infrastructure

OPCHAIN.Name: Gaining node access
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) gain access to a node in the targeted infrastructure

OPCHAIN.Name: Deploy waterholing tool
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) deploy code or data that allows them to redirect parts of the network traffic

OPCHAIN.Name: Escalate privileges
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) gain higher privileges on the controlled node

OPCHAIN.Name: Manipulating data structures
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) perform data or code manipulation in order to influence program execution or network traffic

OPCHAIN.Name: Exploit vulnerability
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) exploit a security vulnerability in the targeted teleinformatic system in order to influence program execution or network traffic

OPCHAIN.Name: Automatic propagation
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) use automatic means of propagation of malicious tools

OPCHAIN.Name: Gain critical node access
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) gain access to the critical node in the targeted infrastructure

OPCHAIN.Name: Deploying infection architecture
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) deploy programatic and data components on a node in order to enhance operational capabilities

OPCHAIN.Name: Injecting code
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) inject code into programmatic components on a node

OPCHAIN.Name: DLL Hijacking
OPCHAIN.Description: [TODO]

OPCHAIN.Name: Deploying persistance
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) deploy code or data components on a node in order to ensure reboot and/or reinstallation survival

OPCHAIN.Name: Backdooring
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) deploy code or data components on a node in order to ensure their access to node in the future

OPCHAIN.Name: Deploying executable modules
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) deploy executable modules in the filesystem or storage of a node

OPCHAIN.Name: Deploying kernel modules
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) deploy kernel modules in the filesystem or storage of a node

OPCHAIN.Name: Performing DGA
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) execute a Domain Generation Algorithm in oder to produce a domain list

OPCHAIN.Name: Execute script
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) execute a script in a node

OPCHAIN.Name: Collecting data
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing data collection

OPCHAIN.Name: Collecting geolocalization data
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing geolocalization data collection

OPCHAIN.Name: Collecting local OS data
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing local OS data collection

OPCHAIN.Name: Collecting local network data
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing local network data collection

OPCHAIN.Name: Collecting intelligence data
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing intelligence data collection

OPCHAIN.Name: Collecting personal data
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing personal data collection

OPCHAIN.Name: Performing data on objectives
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing actions on operation objectives

OPCHAIN.Name: CC interacting
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing communication via the Command and Control channel

OPCHAIN.Name: Passive CC interacting
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing communication via the Command and Control channel with the passive role of remote CC node

OPCHAIN.Name: Exfiltrating data
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing data exfiltration into outside of targeted infrastructure

OPCHAIN.Name: CC live interacting
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing communication via the Command and Control channel with the active role of remote CC node

OPCHAIN.Name: Shell interacting
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing interaction with the system shell in a node

OPCHAIN.Name: Filesystem interacting
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing interaction with the filesystem in a node

OPCHAIN.Name: Hardware interacting
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing interaction with the hardware attached to a node

OPCHAIN.Name: Performing DoS attack
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing a Denial of Service attack

OPCHAIN.Name: Performing DDoS attack
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing a Distributed Denial of Service attack

OPCHAIN.Name: Destroying data
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing data destruction

OPCHAIN.Name: Compromising data integrity
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing data modification, compromising data integrity

OPCHAIN.Name: Compromising configuration integrity
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing configuration modification, compromising configuration integrity

OPCHAIN.Name: Hiding
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing actions with the purpose of evasing detection of their presence

OPCHAIN.Name: Eliminating defensive software
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing actions aiming at disabling or damaging defensive software

OPCHAIN.Name: Evading defensive software
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing actions aiming at evasing detection of their presence with defensive software

OPCHAIN.Name: Autodestructing
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing autodestruction actions on parts of malicious data, code and/or infractructure

OPCHAIN.Name: Verifying environment
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing environment verification in order to avoid analysis in analytical environments

OPCHAIN.Name: Obfuscating data
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing operations on data in order to render it meaningless or difficult to understand

OPCHAIN.Name: Encrypting data
OPCHAIN.Description: Operator(s) are performing data encryption
